sentences.sentence: He didn't know what it was, so he researched it, and he found a plasterer that said 'this is great!
sentences.translation: 他不知道那是什么，所以他必须研究，他说：'找到了泥水，这是伟大！

sentences.sentence: Zdziko (his nickname), a bricklayer and plasterer in Poland, worked in Britain as a gardener until, two years ago, the jobs dried up.
sentences.translation: (他的绰号)，在波兰国内的时候是一个砌砖工和粉刷工，到了英国后成了一名花匠，直到两年前，就业机会枯竭。

sentences.sentence: Plasterer trade certification is compulsory in Quebec and available, but voluntary, in Ontario, Saskatchewan and British Columbia.
sentences.translation: 在魁北克省，泥水匠行业认证是强制性的，但在安大略省，萨斯喀彻温省和不列颠哥伦比亚省是自愿的。
